title: Create FO-06 server actions
description:
Create server actions for FO-06.

- `app/fo-06/actions.ts`

5. **generateCompletionSummary(context)** - Mirror FO-05

```typescript
interface GatheringContext {
  name: string;
  exchanges: Array<{ question: string; answer: { text: string } }>;

}
```
